question:
With reference to the 2019 edition of Exercise Yudh Abhyas, consider the following statements:
  1. It is an Indo-US joint military training under the US Army Pacific Partnership Program.
  2. The exercise involves drills under expected UN peace keeping mission conditions.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: It is one of the largest joint military exercises between India and USA. It is a part of the US Army Pacific Partnership Program. The forces will train at the battalion level and plan at the brigade level. This practice started in 2004. Statement 2 is correct:        The exercise will enable sharing of expertise. The exercise will involve training under condition similar to those expected during UN peace keeping mission. This will enable higher jointmanship and interoperability during actual missions. The 2018 edition took place in Uttarakhand.
